SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class Trace

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.Trace
public class Trace extends Object
Represents a distributed trace. A trace contains a tree of spans representing operations across services. The trace ID is a 128-bit identifier shared by all spans in the trace.
Author:
Chris Burdess

    • Trace

      public Trace(String rootSpanName)
      Creates a new trace with a generated trace ID and a root span.
      Parameters:
      rootSpanName - the name for the root span

    • Trace

      public Trace(String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a new trace with a generated trace ID and a root span.
      Parameters:
      rootSpanName - the name for the root span
      kind - the kind for the root span

    • Trace

      public Trace(SpanContext parentContext, String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a trace continuing from a remote span context. The new root span will be a child of the remote span.
      Parameters:
      parentContext - the remote parent span context
      rootSpanName - the name for the local root span
      kind - the kind for the root span

  • Method Details

    • fromTraceparent

      public static Trace fromTraceparent(String traceparent, String rootSpanName)
      Creates a trace from a W3C traceparent header. If the header is invalid, creates a new trace instead.
      Parameters:
      traceparent - the traceparent header value
      rootSpanName - the name for the local root span
      Returns:
      a new trace

    • fromTraceparent

      public static Trace fromTraceparent(String traceparent, String rootSpanName, SpanKind kind)
      Creates a trace from a W3C traceparent header. If the header is invalid, creates a new trace instead.
      Parameters:
      traceparent - the traceparent header value
      rootSpanName - the name for the local root span
      kind - the kind for the root span
      Returns:
      a new trace
